2.6.8  Improved Textures

  • Nine new patterns are added.
  • New warps are added, cylindrical, spherical, toroidal and planar mapping.
  • Texturing the difference: cutaway_textures.
  • Give the interior an other texture than the exterior: interior_texture.
  • Triangle texture interpolation, using a list of textures.
  • More natural light behavior for transparent objects with reflection: conserve_energy.
  • More natural reflection and a new finish reflection{} block. Adding fresnel reflection and manually controlled 'angle dependent' reflection.
  • Normal accuracy keyword for more control.
  • Keeping control over the bump height: normal no_bump_scale.
  • Filter now also works as filter in layered textures.
  • Transmit now works consistent inside as well as outside the 0 - 1 range.
